org.apache.flex.swf.tags

Class DefineFontInfo2Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.Tag
      • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.DefineFontInfoTag
        • org.apache.flex.swf.tags.DefineFontInfo2Tag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharacterReferrer, IFontInfo, ITag

    public class DefineFontInfo2Tag
extends DefineFontInfoTag
    Represents a DefineFontInfo2 tag in a SWF file.

    DefineFontInfo2 is identical to DefineFontInfo, except that it adds a field for a language code. If you use the older DefineFontInfo, the language code will be assumed to be zero, which results in behavior that is dependent on the locale in which Flash Player is running.
